initial_question.title: The project could not be initialized
initial_question.body:
**Describe the bug**
When I do `npx justd-cli@latest init` it says 443, I can't initialize.

```
pnpx justd-cli@latest init --force
✔ Initializing.
? Components folder: src/components
? Utils folder: src/utils
? Where would you like to place the CSS file? src/app/globals.css
⠼ Installing dependencies.node:internal/deps/undici/undici:12618
    Error.captureStackTrace(err, this);
          ^

TypeError: fetch failed
    at node:internal/deps/undici/undici:12618:11
    at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
    at async Command.Mt (file:///Users/jayden/Library/Caches/pnpm/dlx/hv4ogqe5k35je5qdlpumszqyva/1942c8f0680-15a33/node_modules/.pnpm/justd-cli@2.2.16_react-dom@19.0.0_react@19.0.0__react@19.0.0/node_modules/justd-cli/dist/index.js:27:4279) {
  cause: Error: connect ECONNREFUSED :::443
      at TCPConnectWrap.afterConnect [as oncomplete] (node:net:1555:16)
      at TCPConnectWrap.callbackTrampoline (node:internal/async_hooks:128:17) {
    errno: -61,
    code: 'ECONNREFUSED',
    syscall: 'connect',
    address: '::',
    port: 443
  }
}

Node.js v18.20.4
```

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. run command  `npx justd-cli@latest init`
2. it occur the error

**Expected behavior**
I hope I can get everything of justd, but currently only global.css can get it normally.

**Additional context**
It seems to be a network error, I admit that I am a Chinese user, but I made sure that I had the proxy turned on, and I could connect to github and google normally, I turned on the terminal to open the proxy. I like your project very much, it looks better than shadcn.
